summary: Boris Knuckleduster is a Whiterun guard with a heavy fist
descriptionHtml:
Boris fights unarmed and will not use any weapons you give him; you can find him at the Whiterun Barracks for hire.
His unarmed damage goes up as you level up and also benefits from the Fists of Steel perk.

Installation:
Extract the file into the /Skyrim/Data folder and make sure it is checked in the launcher; that\'s it!

v1: Initial alpha release
author: mrjentipede
